solution_line_template: It earned {num_graphics_cards}*{cost_graphics_card} = <<{num_graphics_cards}*{cost_graphics_card}={earned_graphics_cards}>>{earned_graphics_cards} dollars by selling graphics cards
It earned {num_hard_drives}*{cost_hard_drive} = <<{num_hard_drives}*{cost_hard_drive}={earned_hard_drives}>>{earned_hard_drives} dollars by selling hard drives
It earned {num_cpus}*{cost_cpu} = <<{num_cpus}*{cost_cpu}={earned_cpus}>>{earned_cpus} dollars by selling CPUs
It earned {num_ram_pairs}*{cost_ram_pair} = <<{num_ram_pairs}*{cost_ram_pair}={earned_ram}>>{earned_ram} dollars by selling RAM

Overall it earned {earned_graphics_cards}+{earned_hard_drives}+{earned_cpus}+{earned_ram} = <<{earned_graphics_cards}+{earned_hard_drives}+{earned_cpus}+{earned_ram}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} dollars this week
